quote: Nothing important is learned; it is simply remembered. – Carlos Ruiz Zafon
fact: Cranberries are sorted for ripeness by bouncing them; a fully ripened cranberry can be dribbled like a basketball.

joke: What do you call a fly without wings? A walk.
